publication.abstract: Â© The Author 2017. Published by Oxford University Press.Motivation: Flux balance analysis and its variants are widely used methods for predicting steadystate reaction rates in biochemical reaction networks. The exploration of high dimensional networks with such methods is currently hampered by software performance limitations. Results: DistributedFBA.jl is a high-level, high-performance, open-source implementation of flux balance analysis in Julia. It is tailored to solve multiple flux balance analyses on a subset or all the reactions of large and huge-scale networks, on any number of threads or nodes.
publication.title: DistributedFBA.jl: High-level, high-performance flux balance analysis in Julia

summary.description: High-level, high-performance, constraint-based reconstruction and analysis in Julia
summary.name: COBRA.jl
